verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
दुःखित मानिस ईश्वर को थुमा
आफ्नैले धोका दिए
मानिसको पाप र ईश्वरको क्रोध
येशूले बोकी दिए
Man of sorrows Lamb of God
By His own betrayed
The sin of man and wrath of God
Has been on Jesus laid

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
शान्तमय भई सहे आरोप्
सहे कुटाई बेईज्जत्
पिताको इच्छा अगि झुके
काँडाको मुकुट लिए
Silent as He stood accused
Beaten mocked and scorned
Bowing to the Father's will
He took a crown of thorns

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
हो त्यो श्रापित क्रुस , मेरो उद्दार्
जहा तिम्रो प्रेम पोखिन्छ
आत्मा मेरो भन्छ, हल्लेलुयाह
आदर भक्ति तपाइलाई
Oh that rugged cross
My salvation
Where Your love poured out over me
Now my soul cries out Hallelujah
Praise and honour unto Thee

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
पिताले पठाये पुत्रलाइ
हाम्रो उद्दार किन्न
उनी सगँ मिलाप गरि
उनैले लाई क्रुसमा टाङ्न
Sent of heaven God's own Son
To purchase and redeem
And reconcile the very ones
Who nailed Him to that tree

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
पापको रिण चुक्ता भो
सबै पुरा तिरियो
येशूको अमूल्य बगेको रगतले
Now my debt is paid
It is paid in full
By the precious blood
That my Jesus spilled

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
अब पाप को दोष
ममा जड छैन
जसले मुक्ति दिन्छन्
स्वन्तन्त्र पारिदिन्छन
Now the curse of sin
Has no hold on me
Whom the Son sets free
Oh is free indeed

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
हेर चट्टान हटिगो
रित्तो चिहान देखियो
हल्लेलुयाह महिमा होस्
उनी बौरी उठे
See the stone is rolled away
Behold the empty tomb
Hallelujah God be praised
He's risen from the grave
